physical_appearance: This is a yellow kebaya top. This kebaya features scalloped borders edged with small floral embroidery. It is made of checked fabric with red dot details. The ends of the kebaya is elongated and tapered.
sgcool_label_text: This kebaya has scalloped borders edged with small red flower embroidery. The checked fabric is double-faced and features red dot details. Kebayas with elongated tapered ends were popular in the 1930s and many were commissioned by Peranakan women. It is part of a donation which contains a mixture of garments worn by Peranakan men and women.
subject_terms_1: folk costume flowers (motifs) Peranakan tops (garments, general) blouses (main garments)
subject_terms_2: Ethnic costume Motifs Peranakan (Asian people) Blouses
